item.title: 西姆库斯称，通胀趋势表明欧洲央行必须采取更多削减措施
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，欧洲央行必须继续降低借贷成本，不过这种举措的步伐将取决于即将公布的数据。【原文：The European Central Bank must continue to lower borrowing costs, though the pacing of such moves will dependent on incoming data, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 中国呼吁举行会谈结束战争，北京寻求全球影响力
item.description: 中国国防部长董军呼吁通过谈判结束乌克兰和加沙战争，并将中国描绘成和平缔造者，因为北京正寻求在全球安全事务中发挥更大影响力。【原文：China’s Defense Minister Dong Jun called for ending the wars in Ukraine and Gaza through negotiations, portraying the country as a peacemaker as Beijing seeks greater influence on security matters worldwide.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 这些不是特朗普以前的关税—真的
item.description:
在他的第一任期内，对所有进口商品征收2%的附加税。这次则是17%。【原文：

In his first term, they amounted to a 2% surcharge on all imports. This time, it’s 17%.

】

item.title: 佐科维称领导权交接前不会采取极端政策
item.description: 印尼总统佐科-维多多（Joko Widodo）命令内阁在下月领导层交接之前保持稳定，避免实施任何突然的政策变动。【原文：Indonesia’s President Joko Widodo ordered his cabinet to maintain stability and avoid implementing any abrupt policy changes ahead of the leadership transition next month.】

item.title: 菲律宾称中国企业不顾紧张局势热衷投资
item.description: 马尼拉一位高级贸易官员周五表示，尽管两国在南海问题上存在争议，但中国公司仍有兴趣在菲律宾投资。【原文：Chinese companies are still interested to invest in the Philippines despite the nations’ dispute in the South China Sea, a top Manila trade official said on Friday.】

item.title: Bicara 领衔三家美国生物技术公司 IPO，融资 7.03 亿美元
item.description: 周四，三家生物技术公司在首次公开募股中售出了股票，这对于一个新进入者近来举步维艰的行业来说是一个令人鼓舞的迹象。【原文：A trio of biotech companies sold shares in their initial public offerings on Thursday, an encouraging sign for a sector whose new entrants have lately struggled.】

item.title: 市场面临风险，英国廉价股票吸引投资者
item.description:
在Merryn Talks Money节目中，基金经理马克-斯莱特（Mark Slater）警告说，虽然股票价值被低估，但英国股票市场本身已经 "被掏空"。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, fund manager Mark Slater warns that while stocks are undervalued, the British equities market itself has been “hollowed out.”

】

item.title: 随着量化宽松政策退出，新西兰央行资产负债表缩减至 2021 年以来最小值
item.description: 随着新西兰储备银行继续减持在大流行病期间购买的债券，该银行的资产负债表已缩减至三年多来的最小值。【原文：The Reserve Bank of New Zealand’s balance sheet has shrunk to its smallest in more than three years as the central bank continues to reduce its holdings of bonds bought during the pandemic.】

item.title: 劳力士涨价，欧米茄二手手表价格在奥运推动下仍下跌
item.description: 尽管作为巴黎奥运会的官方计时赞助商，瑞士品牌欧米茄的二手手表备受瞩目，但其价格在上个月仍出现下跌。【原文：Prices for used watches made by Swiss brand Omega suffered declines in the past month despite the high profile exposure it received as the official timekeeping sponsor of the Paris Olympics.】

item.title: 赞比亚铜矿急需电力，找到了不可能的救星
item.description: 赞比亚最大的矿场正在转向一个令人惊讶的电力来源，因为这个铜矿生产国正在与前所未有的能源危机作斗争：南非电力公司 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.（Eskom 控股 SOC 有限公司）直到 3 月份还面临着严重的电力短缺。【原文：Zambia’s biggest mines are turning to a surprising power source as the copper-producing nation battles an unprecedented energy crisis: South African electricity company Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd., which until March faced its own severe deficit.】

item.title: 据称 Blackstone 考虑出售价值 70 亿美元的签证公司 VFS
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士称，Blackstone Inc. 在收到潜在投资者的兴趣后，正在考虑各种方案，包括出售其在签证外包和技术服务公司 VFS Global 的多数股权。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering options including a sale of its majority stake in visa outsourcing and technology services firm VFS Global after receiving interest from prospective investors, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Nifty 突然飙升令交易员措手不及
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 黑客攻击台湾证券交易所和主要银行，这是一起神秘的外国攻击事件
item.description: 周四，黑客攻击了台湾的金融平台，包括证券交易所和贷款机构兆丰金融控股有限公司（Mega Financial Holding Co.【原文：Hackers hit Taiwanese financial platforms including the stock exchange and lender Mega Financial Holding Co. on Thursday, briefly disrupting their websites in what local media described as an attack by foreign agents.】

item.title: 前美联储成员杜德利认为下周有理由降息半点
item.description: 前纽约联储主席威廉-达德利（William Dudley）表示，他认为下周的会议有可能将利率下调半个百分点。【原文：Former New York Federal Reserve President William Dudley said he sees scope for a half-point rate cut at next week’s meeting.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美联储大幅降息可能性，国债上涨
item.description: 由于投资者评估了美联储下周降息半个百分点的可能性，美国国债在较短期票据的带动下反弹。【原文：US Treasuries rallied, led by shorter-dated notes, as investors assessed the likelihood of a half percentage point Federal Reserve interest rate cut next week.】

item.title: 中国债券收益率降至历史最低点，干预成为关注焦点
item.description: 中国政府债券延续升势，使基准收益率创下历史新低，尽管中国政府对债券反弹进行了回击，但交易员们仍踊跃购买债券。【原文：China’s government bonds extended an advance, sending benchmark yields to a record low, as traders piled into the securities despite the authorities’ pushback against the rally.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注日元将进一步反弹
item.description: 一些对冲基金在期权市场上增设了看涨日元的赌注，因为他们预期日元将延续涨势，使其成为本季度全球表现最好的货币。【原文：Some hedge funds are adding bullish yen wagers in the options market on their expectation that the currency will extend the rally that’s made it the world’s top performer this quarter.】

item.title: Seven & I提案推动永旺等日本零售商上涨
item.description: Seven & i Holdings Co.的收购提案引发了投资者对永旺株式会社（Aeon Co.）等其他日本零售商的兴趣，从而提振了它们的股价。【原文：The drama over a takeover proposal for Seven & i Holdings Co. has gotten investors interested in other Japanese retailers such as Aeon Co., boosting their share prices.】

item.title: 中国降温债券涨势的措施削弱了对理财产品的需求
item.description: 有迹象表明，中国官员正在回击创纪录的债券涨势，这至少让一部分投资者望而却步，而这部分投资者正是近期债券涨势的主要推动力。【原文：Signs that Chinese officials are pushing back on the record-breaking bond rally are deterring at least one group of investors that have been a key driver of recent gains.】

item.title: 渤海私人信贷交易为中国借款人提供蓝图
item.description: 在债券销售陷入僵局、银行拒绝贷款要求之后，渤海租赁有限公司需要迅速找到 20 亿美元。【原文：Bohai Leasing Co. needed to find $2 billion fast, after a bond sale stalled and banks balked at demands for a loan.】

item.title: 美联储降息预期升温，黄金再创新高
item.description: 黄金继周四飙升近2%至历史最高点后，再创新高，原因是在市场普遍预期美联储下周降息之前，美元延续跌势。【原文：Gold rose to another record high — after surging almost 2% to an all-time peak on Thursday — as the dollar extended declines ahead of a widely expected Federal Reserve rate cut next week.】

item.title: 下跌 30% 后，PDD 的中国顶级成长股地位存疑
item.description: 滴滴出行控股公司（PDD Holdings Inc. ）作为中国绩优科技股的地位岌岌可危，因为这家电子商务公司的销售额低于预期，而且竞争威胁日益加剧，引发了投资者的信心危机。【原文：PDD Holdings Inc.’s position as China’s top-performing tech stock is in danger, amid a crisis of investor confidence over the e-commerce firm’s worse-than-expected sales and growing competitive threats.】

item.title: 据说 Thoma Bravo 将为 Sailpoint 首次公开募股面试银行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Thoma Bravo 已开始与承销商面谈，该公司正在探索包括 Sailpoint Technologies Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo has begun interviewing underwriters as the firm explores options including an initial public offering for Sailpoint Technologies Inc., roughly two years after taking the company private, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 凯雷尝试出售标准航空后选择 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. has decided to take StandardAero Inc. public after trying to sell the aircraft maintenance services provider, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马斯克因社交媒体法律称澳大利亚官员为 "法西斯主义者
item.description: 科技界亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）将澳大利亚政府称为 "法西斯主义者"，因为澳大利亚政府提议制定新法律来打击数字不实信息，尤其是社交媒体网站上的不实信息。【原文：Tech billionaire Elon Musk has labeled the Australian government as “fascists” over proposed new laws to crack down on digital misinformation, particularly on social media websites.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。S&P 500指数上涨1.3万亿美元。通用汽车正在洽谈从中国购买电动汽车电池技术。史蒂夫-科恩的 Point72 准备返还部分资本。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. S&P 500 stages a $1.3 trillion rally. GM in talks to buy EV batteries with technology from China. Steve Cohen’s Point72 prepared to return some capital. Here’s what’s moving markets. —Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 中国假日考验因消费低迷而萎靡不振的消费类股
item.description: 在消费复苏艰难的背景下，中国即将到来的两个公众假期成为消费相关股票的焦点。【原文：China’s two upcoming public holidays are putting a spotlight on consumer-related shares amid a struggling spending recovery.】

item.title: 受风暴和风险偏好情绪影响，石油将迎来一个月来的首次周涨幅
item.description: 由于弗朗辛风暴扰乱了原油生产，在美联储降息预期到来之前，风险情绪席卷整个市场，石油创下一个月来的首次周涨幅。【原文：Oil headed for its first weekly gain in a month as storm Francine disrupted crude production, and a risk-on tone swept across wider markets ahead of expected Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 墨西哥财政团队将留任辛鲍姆政府
item.description: 在当选总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆即将上任的政府中，墨西哥财政部的高层团队几乎全部留任。【原文：Almost the entirety of Mexico’s Finance Ministry’s top team will stay in their position in the incoming administration of President-elect Claudia Sheinbaum.】
